main_definition: Easy to understand, do, or deal with; uncomplicated.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not complex; straightforward in nature or structure.
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher used simple language so the students could easily grasp the concept.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Free from luxury or ostentation; modest and unpretentious.
meanings_and_examples.example: She dressed simply, choosing comfortable clothes over fashionable ones.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not involving elaborate detail; lacking complication.
meanings_and_examples.example: The simple design of the app made it easy for users to navigate.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Plain or ordinary in nature, not particularly impressive or special.
meanings_and_examples.example: He had a simple life with no extravagant possessions but was content.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easily grasped or understood; clear and uncomplicated.
meanings_and_examples.example: The instructions were so simple that anyone could follow them without difficulty.
